page.title: 12Local News Stories
page.content:
{Another Chance For Disabled Man ------------------------------- Neil Cartwright a{disabled}30 year old wanted a specially adapted{bungalow but the Cheshire County Council would not let him build it because if he drove his disabled car into the road there would be a crash. They are having another meeting on{July 18th {1985}to discuss it again.(Y.E.)
_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*_*
{Rose Queen at Village Fete -------------------------- On{Saturday 15th June}there was a Summer Fete in the village.{Lynsey {Potter}aged 11 of Dunham Hill School was the Rose Queen. The page boy was {Timothy Lyon (6),}the 4 Rosebuds were {Nina Solarin (7),Alexandra Vlasto (8) {Jessica Holway (6) and Caroline
